title: Marvel NOW! Week 59/All-New Marvel NOW! Week 002 01-01-2014
description:
Happy New Year, folks! Good news, everybody! It's the first of the month and the first of the year and Colorado has legalized recreational weed!

It's the first of the month and I wouldn't fuck with me. Why?
'Cause it's the 1st of the month and now we smokin', chokin', rollin' blunts
And sippin' on 40 ounces thuggin' come come we got the blessed rum
From jumpin' all nights we high
If we got the food, you know it's the 1st of the month
and my nigga we chills foe real
--thank you, Bone Thugs n'Harmony

Hi folks! As per usual, I didn't see a collected torrent for this week's Marvel NOW! titles yet, so I thought I'd upload one. Included are:

Guardians of the Galaxy 010
New Avengers 013.INH
Savage Wolverine 013
The Superior Foes of Spider-Man 007

None of these are .NOW issues, which also means NONE of them are actually All-New Marvel NOW! titles. Anyways, if you like them and have the money, BUY THEM and support your favorite creators, writers, artists, local comic shops and publishers. All my thanks to all the uploaders and scanners and seeders out there! Enjoy! (and seed!)


Hope you all have a fantastic year ahead of you.
